00001 #ifndef CHSQUARE_H
00002 #define CHSQUARE_H
00003 
00004 #include <vector>
00005 
00006 #include <QCoreApplication>
00007 
00008 #include "chlib.h"
00009 #include "chconsts.h"
00010 
00011 class QMLCHESSLIB_COMMON_DLLSPEC ChSquare {
00012     Q_DECLARE_TR_FUNCTIONS(ChSquare)
00013 public:
00014     ChSquare(int row, int column);
00015     explicit ChSquare(int index);
00016     ChSquare():_index(0) {}
00017     int row() const {
00018         return _index / CH_BOARD_SIZE;
00019     }
00020     int column() const {
00021         return _index % CH_BOARD_SIZE;
00022     }
00023     int index() const {
00024         return _index;
00025     }
00026     bool operator==(const ChSquare &square) const {
00027         return square.index() == _index;
00028     }
00029     bool operator<(const ChSquare &square) const {
00030         return  _index < square.index();
00031     }
00032 private:
00033     int _index;
00034 };
00035 
00036 typedef std::vector<ChSquare> ChSquares;
00037 
00038 #endif // CHSQUARE_H
